attributes.action: Remove all covid corona virus restrictions and get on with normal life
attributes.additional_details: The rules are depressing, queuing to enter shops is not good. Mask wearing is a nuisance. All this has achieved is a big fat 0 and the country as a whole has suffered. We should just get on with life without being controlled in the way we have been. If people get ill then so be it, this counties restrictions have destroyed business and all the hard work put in to repair the damage done by Labours last reign. Lets get back to normal before we become a communist state, and fast!
attributes.background: I want the government to completely halt any covid regulations and allow the country to return to normal life. Therefore going back to how the country was before the pandemic started. People are fed up of having our rights changed continually. Let us lead out lives how we want to.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Do not implement a second national lockdown or other restrictions this winter: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549862

Fund & provide services to allow the vulnerable to shield & re-open the economy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552023

Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469

Referendum on current restrictions and any further lockdowns: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539

Repeal second National Lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557045
